ygData.subject: Re: Voodoo3 2000, System, Cable Modem
ygData.msgSnippet: I find my Voodoo 3 3000 to be an excellent card. It certainly replaced my TNT in my current system. My TNT was always overheating and crashing my system. The
ygData.messageBody:
I find my Voodoo 3 3000 to be an excellent card. It certainly replaced my
TNT in my current system. My TNT was always overheating and crashing my
system. The Voodoo 3 hasn't been the cause of any crashes so far and its
FAST. Runs Everquest great of course = )

----- Original Message -----
From: troy <troy@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 1:25 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Voodoo3 2000, System, Cable Modem


> From: troy <troy@...>
>
>
> On the other hand, I upgraded from an Nvidia TNT to a Voodoo3 3000 (AGP)
> with 16MB onboard. I find the money well spent.
>
> On Tue, 1 Jun 1999, Trevor Gray wrote:
>
> > From: "Trevor Gray" <xenogear@...>
> >
> > DONT get the Voodoo 3 anything go for a Nvidia Ultra Tnt2. I work at
> > CompUSA and have seen toooo many returns of the STB (yes STB makes the
3dfx
> > cards) crud..The Diamond 770 or thr Creative Ultra TNT2 is alot better
deal.
> >
> > Trevor
>
